body.p: The affiant J F Rascoe States that he a Loyal man & has ever been true & loyal to the Government of the United States, That he is well and entirely aquainted with J. Oscar Hunter that he is a young man of good family the Son of a widowed mother Mrs Sabra Hunter of The County of Caldwell and that he J Oscar Hunter from his boyhood up to the present time of entering the Rebel service was a Genteel orderly well behaved young man Sober and industrious,
Subscribed & Sworn to before me by this 13" day of May 1865,,
